Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientHandler
    ClientHandler class: It takes care of managing the communication with the associated client with the assigned socket It implements Runnable because each thread handles the communication with its client in parallel
    FileReader
    FileReader Class is created to allow the jar to correctly read the files into the resources
    Server
    Server Class: Once the server has been created with the parameters passed by the main server, it listens at the port and accepts every client connection.
    ServerMain
    ServerMain Class: This class setup the parameters passed from command line and creates the Server, if nothing is passed it takes the port number and the host address from json file (networkSettings.json)
    TimerThread
    This class handle a timer for each client, when the timer is over a client disconnect with server Then this class send a disconnection message to all the clients
